description: The ADVERSE_EVENT_HISTORY table contains the history of adverse event records for a patient.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when this update to the adverse event was made.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who made this update to the adverse event.

columns.name: HX_NOTE_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the note containing the comments for this update of the adverse event record.

columns.name: HX_RESEARCH_ATTRIBUTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the study attribution level for the adverse event at the time the adverse event was documented.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unrelated


Unlikely


Possible


Probable


Definite

columns.name: HX_SERIOUS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this adverse event was considered serious at the time the adverse event was documented.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HX_EXPECTED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this adverse event was considered expected at the time the adverse event was documented.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HX_SERIOUS_YN

columns.name: HX_RESOLVED_DATE
columns.description: The date the adverse event was resolved at the time the adverse event was documented.

columns.name: HX_AE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the status of this adverse event at the time of this update.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: HX_RESEARCH_ATTR_NOT_COLL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the attribution for the associated research study was collected for this adverse event at the time of the update. 'Y' indicates that an attribution was not collected. 'N' or NULL indicate that an attribution was collected.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HX_SERIOUS_YN
